sqlMap.update: insert into myalbum_list (myalb_list_no, myalb_no, mus_no, myalb_list_indate) values ( seq_myalb_list_no.nextval, #myalb_no#, #mus_no#, sysdate)
sqlMap.select: select distinct b.mus_no , c.mus_title, a.myalb_no, d.alb_image, a.myalb_name, e.sing_name from myalbum a, music c, myalbum_list b , album d, singer e where mem_id = #id# and b.myalb_no = a.myalb_no and b.mus_no = c.mus_no and d.alb_no = c.alb_no and e.sing_no = d.sing_no and a.myalb_no = #myalb_no#
